source.name: Demo Question
source.instructions:
## Reading Question
Rearrange the code blocks below to create a loop that iterates over an array and prints each element of the array. 
**Note:** some of the code blocks will not be used.

source.name: Practice MCQ
source.instructions:
## Multiple Choice Question
How did the Java programming language get its name?

answers.answer: the Indonesian island the creator was from
the amount of coffee consumed while developing the language
the JavaScript language it was inspired by

source.guidance: Java was named by its creator, James Gosling, of Sun Microsystems for the amount of coffee consumed while developing the language.

source.name: Fill in the Blank Demo Question
source.instructions:
## Fill in the Blank
Fill in the blanks below.
source.text:
True or False: Java is a compiled language. <<<True>>>
True or False: You do not use semi-colons at the end of each line of code in Java. <<<False>>>
source.guidance:
Java is a compiled language.
Java does use semi-colons at the end of each line of code.

text: True or False: Java is a compiled language.
True or False: You do not use semi-colons at the end of each line of code in Java.

source.name: Parsons Problem
source.instructions:
## Parson's Problem
Rearrange the code blocks below into the proper order. **Note**, not all of the code blocks will be used.
source.initial:
The first code block
The second code block
The third code block
I am not correct #distractor
I am not correct #distractor
source.guidance:
The first code block
The second code block
The third code block

source.name: Standard Code Test
source.instructions: When you have finished this assignment, click the Submit button below.

sequence.feedback: Your output should be 3 times the inputted value
If the user enters a non-integer value, you should print "Please enter an integer"
